memory.title: Waking Up with New Knowledge
memory.memory: I woke up this morning thinking about Hino and her memory condition. Yesterday I discovered that she loses her memories every day. Today I need to help her remember our meeting.

memory.title: Preparing to Help Hino
memory.memory: I'm getting ready for school, making my own breakfast since my parents are away. I'm bringing my camera and the photos I took of Hino yesterday. I need to be gentle and patient with her today.

memory.title: Planning My Approach
memory.memory: I'm thinking about how to approach Hino today. She won't remember me from yesterday, so I need to reintroduce myself gently. I'll show her the photos and try to help her understand our connection.
